column4: packages in edgy-backports should not have dependencies that are not themselves in edgy-backports, correct?
no, incorrect. backports requires standard universe and multiverse to be enabled. see their pages, it should be mentioned there i think
!backports > astecp    (astecp, see the private message from Ubotu)
sorry, I mean a lib that is only available in edgy ... but it looks like I made a mistake and downloaded the fiesty version; thanks :-)
